Package org.jlab.mya

Enum EventCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<EventCode>
      • org.jlab.mya.EventCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<EventCode>
    public enum EventCode
extends java.lang.Enum<EventCode>
    Mya event codes. There are two types of events: updates and informational. Some informational event types are also intended to represent disconnections, or gaps in event history.
